ack.title: Acknowledgements
ack.p: This work was made possible by financial support from the Palaeontological Scientific Trust (PAST) and its Scatterlings of Africa programmes, as well as the African Origins platform of the National Research Foundation (NRF) ((AOGR)UIDÂ¼826103). The support of the DST/NRF Centre of Excellence in Palaeosciences (CoE in Palaeosciences) towards this research is hereby acknowledged.
